name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 17, the London Criminal Court in the UK charged Zou Zhenhao (transliteration), a 27-year-old Chinese doctoral student, with sexually assaulting 10 women while in the UK from 2019 to 2023. The prosecutor said that Zou Zhenhao looked like "a smart and charming young man", but in fact he was "a habitual offender of sexual assault, voyeurism and rape." However, Zou Zhenhao denied all the charges and said that he was used to filming his sexual behavior with his sexual partner, and the pornographic photos and images were taken with the consent of the other party. The British police also searched his dormitory and found cameras. Zou Zhenhao argued that these actions were just out of curiosity. In addition, the police also found pictures of the anesthetic sevoflurane on his mobile phone, and Zou Zhenhao claimed that it was a mistaken shot caused by a malfunction of the mobile phone.

content:
On February 22, it was revealed online that Shanghai Tongji Environmental Protection Consulting Co., Ltd. was unable to pay employees' wages and social security fees due to a broken capital chain. The company's available funds in the account were less than 200,000 yuan. After the company receives the money, it will give priority to paying social security, economic compensation and unpaid wages.
Public information shows that the company is the contractor of Tongji University's Class A environmental assessment qualification reform and is controlled by Shanghai Tongji University. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkYq2hBaoAMwFO5.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 21, Qidong County, Hunan. An 18-year-old girl said that her father was taken away by the police for drunk driving on January 6. He died strangely in the detention center in the early morning of January 7. The police did not notify the family immediately; the father was dead but the family was told that he was still being rescued; the family was not allowed to see the body and surveillance video; the autopsy results showed that it was sudden cardiac death. But the girl said that her father was in good health and had no major diseases. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893262399559397376/pu/img/RabhmBZzQt-gOSfO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 20, anchor "Hu Chenfeng" asked for a day off from the audience due to illness: "Mr. Hu Chenfeng is ill, so I would like to ask all netizens and shareholders for a day off, hope you approve."

Blogger A in the comment area replied: "Approved! I hope Mr. Hu will recover soon." Netizen B replied: "Please comment if you disagree." As a result, netizens replied one after another: "No! Approved!"

As of now, the relevant comments have been deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkY_7uObkAAzpeh.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 21, Wuhan, Hubei. A netizen posted that his cousin had intellectual disabilities since childhood and worked in the kitchen with a monthly salary of 2,000 yuan. He was introduced by an acquaintance to Wuhan Taiyitang Chinese Medicine Hospital for acne treatment. The hospital prescribed some Chinese medicine at a cost of more than 10,000 yuan. Later, the hospital said that further treatment was needed, and the cost was about 40,000 yuan. After the cousin said he had no money, the hospital induced the cousin to borrow 40,000 yuan.
The netizen said that the hospital did not provide treatment details afterwards, and said that the cousin was an adult and the loan was voluntary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Nature" released a ranking of global institutions' retraction rates. Jining First People's Hospital topped the list of retraction rates. Between 2014 and 2024, more than 5% of its total published papers were retracted, totaling more than 100 papers. This is 50 times the global average.
The second and third places on the retraction rate list are Cangzhou Central Hospital in Hebei Province and Huaihe Hospital of Henan University, with a retraction rate of about 3.5%. Among the top ten institutions with the highest retraction rate, seven are Chinese institutions, all of which are hospitals and medical schools.
According to Dimensions data, of the 136 institutions with a retraction rate of more than 1%, about 70% are Chinese institutions, of which nearly 60% are hospitals or medical universities.
Jining First People's Hospital had a large-scale academic misconduct incident several years ago. In 2020, Elizabeth Bick, an academic integrity investigator in California, found more than 400 articles with highly identical content, suspected...
fullContent:
《Nature》发布全球机构撤稿率排名，济宁市第一人民医院在撤稿率排行榜上位居榜首，2014年-2024年间，其总发表论文中有超过5%被撤稿，共计100多篇。是全球平均水平的50倍。
 分列撤稿率榜单二三名的是河北沧州市中心医院、河南大学淮河医院，撤稿率约为3.5%左右。在撤稿率前十的机构中，中国机构占据七席，均是医院以及医学院。
  根据Dimensions的数据，在撤稿率超过1%的136家机构中，大约70%为中国机构，其中接近60%为医院或医科大学。
 济宁市第一人民医院早在数年前就出现大规模的学术不端事件 。2020年，加州学术诚信调查员伊丽莎白·比克发现了400 多篇内容高度雷同，疑似来自统一论文工厂的论文，这些论文几乎全部来自中国的几十家医院，其中济宁市第一人民医院的论文最多，超过100篇。
。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a resident living in London received an anonymous letter stating that if anyone can "bring" Hong Konger Chung Han-lam, who is wanted by Hong Kong Red Notice, to the Chinese Embassy in the UK, they can receive a reward of HK$1 million.
The letter stated that Chung Han-lam had violated the crime of inciting secession and colluding with foreign or overseas forces to endanger national security, and listed his personal information, including place of residence, gender, date of birth, height, body shape, and race. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkZaYjyXYAAdyLp.jpg

content:
February 21. Liaoning. Mr. Duan said that his daughter was a graduate student at Dalian Medical University. On the afternoon of February 13, her tutor kept urging her to submit the original data for the paper. At 17:03, his daughter placed an order to buy charcoal and burned herself to commit suicide.
Mr. Duan also said: "I heard from an insider that the tutor had already given her original data to others to publish articles" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkZiH7fXsAAPzhj.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump said in an interview with Fox Radio that "Zelensky's participation in the talks is not very important" "Zelensky once had the most beautiful cities, and now they are all destroyed"
The host emphasized: "But (the war) is Russia's fault, Mr. President"
Trump: "(Ukraine) 1,000-year-old domes, everything is destroyed, a bit like Gaza"
The host emphasized again: "This is exactly what I said, it's Putin's fault"
Trump: "I'm tired of hearing it"
